alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:30PM CDT until May 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JONES AND EAST CENTRAL FISHER COUNTIES... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Ranch Road 126, or 7 miles south of Neinda, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Neinda around 540 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Us-180 And Ranch Road 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
